Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 7

http://onlywire.com/r/83005339

Ultimate Reset Day 7, almost a week down! The first six days went pretty smoothly. I can take a moment and appreciate all the effort and discipline I’ve needed to get this far with the Ultimate Reset. Is the program starting to feel easier? Let’s find out how Day 7 of the Ultimate Reset went!

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 7

Unfortunately, I did not sleep well at all last night. I did get out of bed, but, I just plopped on the couch for awhile because I was so tired. Eventually, I got up and made a glass of distilled water with Mineralize and Oxygenize. I also took the two Optimize capsules. I am definitely getting used to the Ultimate Reset supplements. Tomorrow starts the Detox supplement and I’m a little nervous about that.

I was looking forward to the breakfast on Day 7 of the Ultimate Reset, OATMEAL. I cooked up some oatmeal with distilled water, added a couple of tablespoons of flax seed, some cinnamon and a chopped up Granny Smith apple. It was prett

Fattest Cities - Richmond - IS IT TRUE?

http://onlywire.com/r/83062023

Fattest Cities – Richmond, is it true? YES!
I cannot believe it!

Well, according to Newsweek’s TheDailyBeast.com, Richmond placed second in the list of the fattest cities!

That is NOT something I want Richmond to be known for! Our state slogan is “Virginia Is For Lovers” NOT “Virginia Is For The Obese“!

With a state slogan of “Everything’s Bigger In Texas“, you would expect some cities from Texas to be on the top 10 list of the fattest cities and you would be right! San Antonio, Texas is ranked as third for the fattest cities in America. But, the Fattest Cities – Richmond, come on!

Fattest Cities – Richmond – Specific Numbers

What are the specific numbers for Richmond?

% of population that is obese: 29.4
% of population with diabetes: 9.9
% of population that exercises frequently: 50.2
% of population that eats produce regularly: 58.1

We have some work to do Richmond!

Let’s END THE TREND of obesity in Richmond!

Fattest Cities – Richmond – It Made

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 8

http://onlywire.com/r/83120078

Ultimate Reset Day 8, Phase 2 and I messed up! No, it isn’t what you are thinking, I didn’t cheat. Just messed up. We’ll get to it. I’ll give you a hint, it is because it is a new phase of the Ultimate Reset. Let’s find out what happened on Day 8 of the Ultimate Reset!

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 8

I did get some decent sleep last night, but I was still tired this morning. I had a follow-up chiropractor appointment this morning, but I did NOT want to get out of bed. So I turned off the alarm and dozed in and out for about 30 minutes. Then I had to rush to get out the door to make the appointment on time. Typical, right? I did have enough time to start the day with the distilled water, Mineralize, Oxygenize and Optimize. (Did you notice something missing

When I got back home, I was HUNGRY! On the menu for the Ultimate Reset breakfast was FRUIT! So, I started cutting up some strawberries, went to cup up a Granny Smith and paused. You know what, just fruit is NO

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 9

http://onlywire.com/r/83286122

Ultimate Reset Day 9 went smoothly. I didn’t forget any supplements, I was able to stay on track, AND, I found another GREAT Ultimate Reset recipe. This may not surprise you, but it is REALLY surprising me that I am not only making these recipes, eating these recipes, BUT also, LOVING these recipes! The Ultimate Reset has definitely introduced some things into our family’s food habits that are going to be sticking around! Thank you Ultimate Reset! Let’s see how Day 9 unfolded…

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 9

I slept pretty well last night and felt pretty good in the morning, but I still didn’t want to get out of bed. It wasn’t that I was so tired I didn’t want to get up, it was just that I was comfortable and sleeping well is just a WONDERFUL experience!

I rolled out of bed and headed to the kitchen. I got all FOUR supplements out and started on them. First up was Detox. It wasn’t so bad today, since I knew what to expect. It STILL isn’t the best thing, b

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 10

http://onlywire.com/r/83436096

Ultimate Reset Day 10 and I’m about halfway through it! I am surprised at how well this journey is going. I’ve gotten into the habit of eating well, drinking that distilled water, taking the Ultimate Reset supplements and staying on track! I’ve been faced with temptation and overcame obstacles. I see a difference on the scale and I can see a difference in the midsection. Thank you Ultimate Reset! Let’s see how Day 10 progressed.

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 10
I went to bed earlier than usual last night and got an AWESOME nights sleep! I actually didn’t set my alarm last night, but I didn’t have to. Why? Because the kids were my alarm. All 3 of them ran in and jumped on us! THAT WAS OUR WAKE UP CALL! They wanted their Shakeology! My wife started on their shakes and I started on the Ultimate Reset supplements. Mixed up a small glass of Detox. I’ve already gotten use to the taste. Still isn’t my favorite but it is doable. Then the tall glass of distilled w

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 11

http://onlywire.com/r/83573856

Ultimate Reset Day 11 and THE HALFWAY POINT! I had another great day of Ultimate Reset meals and am feeling great. The supplementation has become second nature. The only “nature” issues are the number of times I have to go to the bathroom because my “eyes were floating”. Hydration is VERY important, especially with a detox like the Ultimate Reset. So, I’ll deal with it. Onto Day 11…

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 11

I had another great night of sleep. I don’t wake up tired, just very comfortable. No “kid” alarm today. I rolled out of bed and mixed up the small glass of Detox. Then I drank the large glass of distilled water with with Mineralize, Oxygenize and Optimize.

On the Ultimate Reset menu for breakfast was fruit, but I opted for Tropical Strawberry Shakeology. Grabbed those yummy strawberries out of the fridge and made my slushy. That definitely hit the spot in the morning.

I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 12

http://onlywire.com/r/83729369

Ultimate Reset Day 12, Friday, thank goodness! Past the halfway point and headed to the weekend. So far the journey hasnt been very bumpy. I havent experience headaches, bathroom issues or skins rashes. All of those things are symptoms of your body releasing toxins. Maybe I didnt have as many toxins in my body as I thought? Either way, I am still going strong with the Ultimate Reset. Lets see what happened on Day 12!Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 12I didnt sleep as well as the past couple of nights. I rolled out of bed and my morning ritual takes me to the kitchen. I mix up a small glass of Detox which tastes much better to me now (better than Alkanalize). Afterwards, I make the large glass of distilled water with with Mineralize, Oxygenize and Optimize. With all that 37 degree water I got a little chill, so I put on a jacket while I waited for the Ultimate Reset breakfast.On the menu for this morning was fruit. Of course that means that Im having

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 13

http://onlywire.com/r/83844485

Ultimate Reset Day 13, compared with two weeks ago, Ive definitely noticed the weight loss and the ease of digestion. I also have been thinking about some of those great Ultimate Reset recipes. I do miss working out though. But according to the experts, I should have renewed energy when I get back to it! Well, lets see how Day 13 of the Ultimate Reset went.Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 13Woke up this morning and we had limited time to get going since we had a long day planned. Rolled out of bed, got started on Detox then the large glass of distilled water with with Mineralize, Oxygenize and Optimize. As all of us got ready to run out the door, I made a delicious Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake with cantaloupe. Jump-Start Weight Loss - THE ANSWER!

http://onlywire.com/r/84870439

Jump-start weight loss.Yep, everyone wants a jump-start.Especially, when there is an upcoming event or if you have hit a plateau.When it comes to diet and exercise, everyone would like to see some results!And there is nothing wrong with that! You SHOULD see some results.But, what if you have hit a plateau? What if you need to jump-start weight loss?Jump-Start Weight Loss The Answer!Hitting a plateau in your results can be very discouraging. Making slight adjustments to your diet can usually help push you through, jump-start weight loss and see results again. But, what if those slight adjustments arent helping?To jump-start weight loss or to break a plateau, a well timed 3 day Shakeology cleanse can help you see results in a healthy way. Why do I say well timed? Well, you do NOT want to do a 3 day Shakeology cleanse when you are REALLY pushing yourself. If you are in the middle of an intense program, that is NOT the time to do a cleanse.Jump-Start Weight L

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 19

http://onlywire.com/r/84932174

Ultimate Reset Day 19started fine but it started to get difficult near the end of the day! We attended a family and friends dinner party. Oh boy, some SERIOUS temptation. Grilled steaks, barbeque chicken, and a chocolate fondue for desert! Aaaaahhhhhhhhh! Did I give in to temptation? Did I stray from the Ultimate Reset? Or did I stay strong? Read on to see how Day 19 of the Ultimate Reset went!Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 19The day started like every other. I started my morning routine with a large glass of distilled water and the Ultimate Reset supplements, Mineralize, Oxygenize, Optimize and Revitalize. But instead of a Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake I opted for lots of melon! I ate a lot of cantaloupe and then tackled the watermelon. It was so good and I was full! So far, so good.I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!It was another crazy day and time got away from me. I found myself late for lunch. I got started on the Ultimate Reset supplements

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 20

http://onlywire.com/r/85058686

Ultimate Reset Day 20!Only one day left!Today was the first time that I had a meal that I didnt prepare off of the Ultimate Reset menu.Was it still OK to eat?Did it fit the Ultimate Reset guidelines?Keep reading to find out!Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 20Day 20 of the Ultimate Reset started out very nice. I had a chance to sleep in a little and it was GREAT! I rolled out of bed and got started on the Ultimate Reset supplements, Mineralize, Oxygenize, Optimize and Revitalize. I did miss having the Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake yesterday, so I really wanted it today. We still have some watermelon, so I added the watermelon and some ice to the shake! Oh, so good! I was good for a couple of hours.I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!As the saying goes, the natives were restless. The kids are feeling better after all catching a cold and I thought it would do them well to go out. So, we decided to go out for lunch and then go to the boo

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY – Day 21

http://onlywire.com/r/85211099

Ultimate Reset Day 21!Surprisingly, I really enjoyed the past 3 weeks. 20 full days without meat.It is definitely a rigorous schedule of meals and supplements. But, Beachbody supports and walks you through each day. I heavily relied on the daily emails from Beachbody. It is very helpful to have the supplement reminders and the full day of meals all in one spot.Day 21 of the Ultimate Reset and THE JOURNEY IS OVEROR IS IT?Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 21Day 21 of the Ultimate Reset. I slept well the night before. I rolled out of bed and headed to the kitchen. Grabbed the large glass of distilled water and prepared the Ultimate Reset supplements, Mineralize, Oxygenize, Optimize and Revitalize. 30 minutes later I enjoyed a Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake with watermelon and ice. Um, um, good!I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!When lunch rolled along, I got started on the supplements. I already knew I was going to have the leftovers from yesterday

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY CONTINUES – Day 22

http://onlywire.com/r/85380440

Ultimate Reset Day 22! What? Day 22? The Ultimate Reset is a 21-day program! Well, that is true, BUT, I like how I feel and I actually have enjoyed the diet guidelines. So, Im going to continue meatless for as long as I can. So that means lots of fruits and veggies! Feeling good is going to take action, right? I just cannot wish for it!Day 22 of the Ultimate Reset and THE JOURNEY CONTINUES!Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY Day 22Day 22 of the Ultimate Reset. I woke up and got started with a large glass of distilled water with the leftover Mineralize. I followed my normal morning routine and when I jumped on the scale I was surprised to see that in the 21 days of the Ultimate Reset, I LOST 9 POUNDS! Wow, it is actually hard to believe. I really did not think I was going to lose that much weight. And it isnt just water weight. I mean, with all the water Ive been drinking there is NO WAY!After that good news I headed to the kitchen again to make a Shakeology shake!

Ultimate Reset – THE JOURNEY CONTINUES – Day 23

http://onlywire.com/r/85508232

Ultimate Reset THE JOURNEY CONTINUES Day 23Ultimate Reset Day 23, well, continuing the guidelines of the Ultimate Reset anyway. Following the guidelines with no meat or dairy has become habit. But throwing in some workouts is culture shock. Find out how the day progressed following the Ultimate Reset guidelinesDay 23 of following the Ultimate Reset guidelines. I started the day with a large glass of distilled water. 30 minutes later I enjoyed a vegan Tropical Strawberry Shakeology with watermelon! Im still feeling really well. I can feel yesterdays INSANITY workout but Im not very sore.I had the girls while my wife and son went to the orthodontist. Today was the day for my son to get his braces. Since they were out, my lovely wife called and asked if I wanted some Chipotle! THATS WHAT IM TALKIN ABOUT! So, again, I enjoyed a Chipotle vegetarian burrito bol. I literally could eat this EVERY DAY! This one I didnt have to share, it was all mine since s

Ultimate Reset Day 25, can I persevere and have success?I had another busy day of training and I know I fell short of the water intake.With such a busy day, did I fall short with anything else?See how Day 25 of the Ultimate Reset wentUltimate Reset THE JOURNEY CONTINUES Day 25In the morning I so looked forward to the vegan Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake with pineapple. First I had to get my water in though. Afterwards, I blended up the shake and sucked it down. All of the cold water and the cold shake had me freezing. I had to put on a jacket in the morning.I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!When lunch came around, I didnt have much time and I hadnt prepared an Ultimate Reset meal. I needed something super quick. I cooked up some oatmeal, added a little natural peanut butter, a little organic cocoa and a little Grade B maple syrup. Chocolate-Peanut Butter oatmeal. AWESOME! That definitely hit the spot. I did forget my water.Which such

Ultimate Reset Day 26. Set Goals, Reach Goals, Make New Goals!Whew! I missed some of my daily goals today.Not exactly the best day of following the Ultimate Reset guidelines.See how Day 26 of the Ultimate Reset wentUltimate Reset THE JOURNEY CONTINUES Day 26The morning was crazy. We had to rush around in the morning. My oldest had a doctors appointment. So I quickly made a vegan Tropical Strawberry Shakeology shake with pineapple. It was good, but in the haste of the morning I forgot to get in my water. Missed goal #1. Bummer.I want to RESET my body with the Ultimate Reset!On the way home from the doctors appointment, I stopped at Chipotle and picked up a veggie burrito bol. By the way we got home it was time for lunch. So I devoured the veggie burrito bol. Aaaahhhhhh, I missed the distilled water AGAIN!Later in the afternoon I had an exam to take.
